name: Impermanence (Guilherme Almeida)
description:
Death is not the end.

Impermanence is an action-adventure game about karma, death, and rebirth. Take part on a journey of exploration and discovery, where your actions, more than your words, have consequences, though they might not be obvious or immediately felt.

When your time on Earth comes to the inevitable end and the wheel of existence spins again, it's the karma from those previous actions that will decide your fate. Know that whether you reincarnate as a human, a demigod, or a chicken, that was your choice.
